Method.name: fetchPerson
fetchPeople
Method.Implementation:
set john = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() do john.SetAt(1, "id") do john.SetAt("John", "name")
set bob = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() do bob.SetAt(2, "id") do bob.SetAt("Bob", "name")
set output = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() do output.Insert(john) do output.Insert(bob)
quit output
